cover.title: TorontoBlueJays
cover.body: The Toronto Blue Jays are a professional baseball club from Toronto, Canada. Due to border restrictions imposed by the COVID-19 epidemic, the club played its home games in TD Ballpark in Dunedin, Florida for April and May of the 2021 season, and Sahlen Field in Buffalo, New York for the 2020 season as well as June and July 2021, before returning to Toronto on July 30.
